title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5.33 - Extension of employment for casual security officers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5.33 - Extension of employment for casual security officers

State Regulations

The employer may extend the employment of a casual security
officer on a day-to-day basis to complete his original assignment on successive
days by notifying the appropriate employment information
center. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5.33

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
